sentences: This issue was first addressed by SBI on Tuesday, 7 December.
A contact group chaired by Crispin dAuvergne (Saint Lucia) met four times and in informal consultations.

The contact group discussed, inter alia, funding of an information clearing house, regional workshops, the status of implementation of the New Delhi work programme on Article 6, and ways to enhance its implementation.
On Tuesday, 14 December, SBI adopted conclusions, and on Friday, 17 December, the COP adopted a decision.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
